Authors:
Enrico Ercole, Giovanni Consiglio, Ledo Setti, Alfredo
Vizzini
Title:
Detecting the phylogenetic position of Haasiella
(Basidiomycota, Agaricomycetes), and the relationships among H.
venustissima and H. splendidissima
Keywords:
Agaricales, Hygrophoraceae, Chrysomphalina, Omphalina,
omphalinoid fungi, , parthenogenetic apomictic taxa, taxonomy,
biodiversity
Abstract:
Based on a combined ITS-LSU rDNA analysis, the omphalinoid
genus Haasiella is shown to be part of the Hygrophoroid clade and sister
to Hygrophorus. H. venustissima and H. splendidissima are conspecific.
splendidissima is considered the tetrasporic and heterothallic form of
H. venustissima.
